project.name: kde
project.description: The KDE project manages the Qt and KDE ebuilds within Gentoo.

longdescription.p: The KDE project consists of two heards that manage the Qt and KDE ebuilds within Gentoo, which include all KDE applications. However, some of the KDE applications might belong to function specific herds due to the fact that the KDE project cannot maintain all of them properly. That is because there are too many applications and many of them are not used by the KDE maintainers. Nevertheless, the project does support the teams that do manage these applications, and will ensure that they use the KDE eclass where appropriate.

goals.p: The goal of the Gentoo KDE team is to provide working support for all packages supported by the KDE Project. We also support as many underlying packages as necessary in order to have a properly working KDE environment.

body.p: The best way to get support with KDE related issues is to address your concerns in the Gentoo Forums. You may also submit a bug report to the KDE team at Gentoo's Bugzilla (do not forget to add your 'emerge --info').
